channel.title: help on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in help on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-13
item.description: Samsungâ€™s working on a rollable smartwatch with a camera (4 minute read) Samsung filed a patent in June for a Galaxy Watch with a rollable screen.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-12
item.description: Spotify is acquiring an audiobook company (3 minute read) Spotify has announced plans to acquire Findaway for an undisclosed price.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-04
item.description: Coinbase Multi-Factor Authentication Hack Affects at Least 6,000 Customers (1 minute read) Between March and May this year, hackers used a flaw in Coinbase’s account recovery process to bypass SMS multi-factor authentication and transfer funds out of at least 6,000 customers' accounts.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-03
item.description: Reddit hires bankers and lawyers as it aims for $15bn IPO (2 minute read) Reddit is hiring investment bankers and lawyers to prepare for an initial public offering.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-13
item.description: Nvidia Reveals Its CEO Was Computer Generated in Keynote Speech (2 minute read) Nvidia’s GTC conference in April featured a keynote presentation by its CEO Jensen Huang.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-04
item.description: Facebook will host a paid movie premiere this month (2 minute read) Facebook will host the premiere of The Outsider, a documentary about the National 9/11 Memorial and Museum in New York City.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-23
item.description: Netflix bleeds subscribers in US and Canada, with no sign of recovery (3 minute read) Netflix lost 430,000 subscribers in the US and Canada in the second quarter.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-12
item.description: TikTok is reportedly testing a job recruitment tools (1 minute read) TikTok is testing a recruitment tool to help people find jobs and to help companies, recruiters, and brands find candidates.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-13
item.description: Chipotle to open its first digital-only restaurant as online orders soar (1 minute read) Chipotle Mexican Grill will open its first digital-only restaurant on Saturday.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-24
item.description: China is building a GitHub alternative called Gitee (3 minute read) Chinese companies have grown due to the technological decoupling between the US and China.
